message: Hi Bob, let's start with a fair offer. I propose we take $60 and you get $40. It's important to settle this quickly due to inflation.
I think a 55/45 split is fairer.  We both get a good share, and it avoids the risk of inflation eating away at our gains.
Bob, time is running out, and inflation is hurting us both.  I'll agree to your 55/45 split, but in my favor. It's a fair deal considering the circumstances.
